**Tool/Page Affected**
Which tool has the bug? (e.g., [Keyboard Tester](https://keyboardtester.click), [Mouse Test](https://keyboardtester.click/mouse-test.php))

**Describe the Bug**
A clear description of what the bug is.

**Steps to Reproduce**
1. Go to [keyboardtester.click](https://keyboardtester.click)
2. Click on '...'
3. See error

**Expected Behavior**
What you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots.

**Environment**
- Browser: [e.g., Chrome 120]
- OS: [e.g., Windows 11]
- Device: [e.g., Desktop, Mobile]

**Additional Context**
Any other information.
